title: A guide for aspiring Data Scientists
description: This year I transitioned from being an aspiring  Data Scientist(a student) to an actual one. When I was preparing to enter this field ,I had a lot of questions about Data Scientists. Like, What do they look like? Where do they come from?  Just kidding.
